sentences.sContent: Mark usually does the cooking when we entertain.
sentences.sCn: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.sContent: Do you get an allowance for entertaining clients?
A museum should aim to entertain as well as educate.
sentences.sCn: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

trans.tranCn: 招待,款待；使娱乐;使欢乐
trans.tranOther: to invite people to your home for a meal, party etc, or to take your company’s customers somewhere to have a meal, drinks etc
